bibdata.title: American National Standard Portable Exposure Rate Meters for Homeland Security
Redline
American National Standard Portable Exposure Rate Meters for Homeland Security - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: ANSI N42.33-2019 (Revison of ANSI N42.33-2006) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard describes design criteria, performance requirements, and performance tests for portable exposure rate meters. The PDF of this standard is available in the IEEE GET program. "IEEE Get Program" grants public access to view and download individual PDFs of select standards at no charge. Visit https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/browse/standards/get-program/page for details.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
